mapper.select: SELECT calid, prjno, empno, title, to_char(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"') startDate, to_char(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"') endDate, content, backgroundcolor, textcolor, allday, url FROM calendar
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar SET title = #{title}, startDate = to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"' ), endDate = to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"' ), content=#{content}, backgroundColor = #{backgroundColor}, textColor=#{textColor}, allDay = #{allDay}, url = #{urlLink} WHERE calid=#{calId}
